entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Investigate and disrupt the Imperial Base on Lok.
entries.journal_entry_description: Investigate and disrupt the Imperial Base on Lok.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Investigate and disrupt the Imperial Base on Lok.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Defeat the Imperial base commander, General Otto.
entries.task04_item_name: The generator's circuitry shorts out causing it to shut down
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Shutdown the power generators in the Imperial base by shorting their circuitry.
entries.task05_item_name: You put a Rebel banner in place of the Imperial one
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Switch some Imperial banners in the Imperial base for Rebel banners.
